nitf
Class Field

java.lang.Object
  nitf.NITFObject
      nitf.Field

public class Field
extends NITFObject

A Field corresponds to the data and basic information regarding a NITF field. Each field in the NITF headers has a Field associated with it.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class nitf.NITFObject
address, INVALID_ADDRESS, NITF_LIBRARY_NAME
